text: this conviction is a victory for every
family who has lost a loved one to the
black hole of addiction this trial has
pulled back the curtain on international
drug dealing in a way that no other
trial has it revealed that Guzman and
his co-conspirators were responsible for
smuggling hundreds of tons of cocaine
heroin methamphetamine and marijuana
into the United States it also revealed
that they were only able to operate on
that scale because of endemic corruption
this is a day of reckoning but there are
more days of reckoning to come come on I
mean this is America and no matter who
the defendant is you still have to fight
to the death no matter what people think
what society thinks what the government
thinks we took that obligation
incredibly seriously and as I said we
left nothing let everything was left on
the battlefield do I think it was a fair
trial no we wouldn't have objected at
all if we thought the trial was
completely fair no defense lawyers ever
thought they've gotten a completely fair
trial after there's a conviction and we
were all honored to represent Joaquin
Guzman and we're all honored to be a
part of what we consider to be a
historical trial
